forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
